item.title: Episode 002 - All Things Livestream Part 1
item.description: Show Notes Our second show was all about live streaming. This episode was jampacked with a lot of information so if you didn’t catch it all the first time around we added a lot of links below. There was so much to cover that we only went over the basics. Our next episode will be the second part of live streaming where we cover advanced topics such as adding graphics and lyrics to your stream, advanced camera adjustments, lighting, and much more.
item.content:
Show Notes

Our second show was all about live streaming. This episode was jampacked with a lot of information so if you didn’t catch it all the first time around we added a lot of links below. There was so much to cover that we only went over the basics. Our next episode will be the second part of live streaming where we cover advanced topics such as adding graphics and lyrics to your stream, advanced camera adjustments, lighting, and much more. As always, if you have any questions please feel free to contact us.

item.title: Episode 001 - The Introduction
item.description: Show Notes This is our very first episode of the Church Media Lab podcast. Meet the two host of our show, Bradley and Anthony. We have quite a few interesting shows planned so stay tuned. As of publishing this we are currently on Pocketcast, AnchorFM, and Spotify. Within the upcoming weeks our podcast should be available in more apps. If you have any media related questions or would like to submit a show topic, please drop us an email or leave a comment on our social media.
item.content:
Show Notes

This is our very first episode of the Church Media Lab podcast. Meet the two host of our show, Bradley and Anthony. We have quite a few interesting shows planned so stay tuned. As of publishing this we are currently on Pocketcast, AnchorFM, and Spotify. Within the upcoming weeks our podcast should be available in more apps. If you have any media related questions or would like to submit a show topic, please drop us an email or leave a comment on our social media. After each episode be sure to check the show notes for links and information about apps and gear we mention.

Show Links

  • Church Media Lab Instagram
  • Church Media Lab Facebook
  • Anthony Instagram
  • Bradley Instagram
  • Anthony’s Lnks
  • Bradley’s Lnks
